page.title: 10A camp-site in Wroxall.
page.content: The campers at Wroxall camp-site come for a holiday from the mainland.A few come from a different country.A lot of people stay for 2 weeks.Most of the campers go on other holidays as well. A lot of people want some more things on the campsite such as a visiting hair dresser,more conveniences,a bath for children,a games room,a bit more for the children to play on,a changing room and a shower at the swiming pool,and take- away meals. The campers want more in Wroxall such as better kerbs for pedestrians and more pavements.Some people want bigger shops,one person wanted a Marks & Spencers.Some people want to be able to get something to eat after nine o'clock on Sundays.Other amenities people want are a railway station and a pitch & putt or crazy golf course.
